trends: There has been one other sighting in North Branford
There were no other sightings in North Branford on or around May 16th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at home alone in my bedroom N.Branford Ct. I felt parralized almost like I was being held down, I was trying to get up and remember being very anxious ,fustrated , and groggy,I was watching a movie on demand when I guess I dozed off . All that was hazzy but from this point on I'm not only alert I am intensely alert like it just wore off thats when I ran to the window to see this object leave I also heard it .Later I noticed a piece of what turned out to be like metal in my thigh,about a year ago it came out itself although my wife saw it it dropped down the drain.
Summary: out-side my window about 10 ft. long sounded like commercial lawnmower ,
